data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Fatehgarh Sahib to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Fatehgarh Sahib, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Fatehgarh Sahib, Punjab, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,602 believers in Fatehgarh Sahib to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 593,597 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Fatehgarh Sahib to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jat Dhillon (Hindu traditions) people might believe through him.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Fatehgarh Sahib, Punjab, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Fatehgarh Sahib, Punjab, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Fatehgarh Sahib, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Fatehgarh Sahib
location.people_groups_list: Jat Dosanj, Brahmin Pushkarna, Rajput Atiras, Jat Ghatwal (Hindu traditions), Jat Dharial
